chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Good day,
Unfortunately, my iPhone 13 Pro was delivered without a charging cable.
Would you send it to me or give me something back?

Best regards
Nino Demetrashvili

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The customer is reporting missing charger cable.
I offered a partial refund, but he wants the cable.

Please send the cable and let me know the tracking number.

Kind regards,
Umit from the Back Care Team

Dear BackCare,

We are willing to offer a commercial gesture for this inconvenience with respect to the amount stated at the Quality Charter of 10 euros. The customer can use this money to buy a cable at their neighbourhood shops. Can you get back to the customer and check whether he agrees to this?

Regards,
CH
